name: PricingCardEight
description: Pricing card with nested card layout featuring badge, price, buttons in secondary-button container, and feature list below.

description.example: Select the perfect plan for your needs

structure.subtitle: string - Subtitle below price, e.g., 'Perfect for small teams' (required)
structure.buttons: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}> - Action buttons, max 2 (required)

planRules.note: Each plan displays in a nested card layout with secondary-button styling for the top section.

buttonRules.note: Buttons render full-width inside secondary-button container. Button variant controlled by ThemeProvider.

propsSchema.plans: Array<{ id: string, badge: string, badgeIcon?: LucideIcon, price: string, subtitle: string, buttons: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>, features: string[] }>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <PricingCardEight plans={[{ id: '1', badge: 'Most Popular', price: '$29/mo', subtitle: 'Perfect for small teams', buttons: [{ text: 'Get Started', href: '/signup' }], features: ['Up to 10 team members', '100GB storage', 'Priority support'] }]} animationType="slide-up" title="Choose Your Plan" description="Select the perfect plan for your needs" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" />
dont: Do not use more than 4 items
